details.title: Space-surface bistatic synthetic aperture radar with global navigation satellite system transmitter of opportunity-experimental results

authors.affiliation: Dept. of Electron., Electr. & Comput. Eng., Univ. of Birmingham, Birmingham
authors.name: M. Cherniakov

authors.affiliation: Dept. of Electron., Electr. & Comput. Eng., Univ. of Birmingham, Birmingham
authors.name: R. Saini

authors.affiliation: Dept. of Electron., Electr. & Comput. Eng., Univ. of Birmingham, Birmingham
authors.name: M. Antoniou

details.abstract: Progress in the study of space-surface synthetic aperture radar is presented. Global navigation satellite system is considered as the transmitter of opportunity. It highlights the various important issues to successfully obtain an image. The experimental testing of the imaging algorithm is presented and verified using a GLONASS satellite signal.

ieee.title: Spatial Decorrelation in GNSS-Based SAR Coherent Change Detection
ieee.displayText: Qilei Zhang, Michail Antoniou, Wenge Chang, Mikhail Cherniakov, "Spatial Decorrelation in GNSS-Based SAR Coherent Change Detection", Geoscience and Remote Sensing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 53, pp. 219-228, 2015, ISSN 0196-2892.

ieee.title: GNSS illuminator based high range resolution algorithm in space-surface bistatic SAR
ieee.displayText: Jie Zhen, Zhenhua Zhang, Shunjun Wu, Guoman Huang, "GNSS illuminator based high range resolution algorithm in space-surface bistatic SAR", Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium (IGARSS) 2010 IEEE International, pp. 4608-4611, 2010, ISSN 2153-7003.

ieee.title: Results of a Space-Surface Bistatic SAR Image Formation Algorithm
ieee.displayText: Michail Antoniou, Rajesh Saini, Mikhail Cherniakov, "Results of a Space-Surface Bistatic SAR Image Formation Algorithm", Geoscience and Remote Sensing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 45, pp. 3359-3371, 2007, ISSN 0196-2892.

ieee.title: Spatial Resolution of Bistatic Synthetic Aperture Radar: Impact of Acquisition Geometry on Imaging Performance
ieee.displayText: A. Moccia, A. Renga, "Spatial Resolution of Bistatic Synthetic Aperture Radar: Impact of Acquisition Geometry on Imaging Performance", Geoscience and Remote Sensing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 49, pp. 3487-3503, 2011, ISSN 0196-2892.

ieee.title: Space-Surface Bistatic Sar Using BeiDou-2 as Illuminator
ieee.displayText: Weiming Tian, Tian Zhang, Cheng Hu, Xiaopeng Yang, Tao Zeng, "Space-Surface Bistatic Sar Using BeiDou-2 as Illuminator", Computer and Information Technology (CIT) 2014 IEEE International Conference on, pp. 118-122, 2014.

ieee.title: Sparse passive radar imaging based on digital video broadcasting satellites using the MUSIC algorithm
ieee.displayText: Tianyun Wang, Changchang Liu, Hongchao Lu, Weidong Chen, "Sparse passive radar imaging based on digital video broadcasting satellites using the MUSIC algorithm", Signal Processing (ICSP) 2012 IEEE 11th International Conference on, vol. 3, pp. 1925-1930, 2012, ISSN 2164-523X.

ieee.title: Space-surface BiSAR based on GNSS signal: Synchronization, imaging and experiment result
ieee.displayText: Weiming Tian, Tian Zhang, Tao Zeng, Cheng Hu, Teng Long, "Space-surface BiSAR based on GNSS signal: Synchronization imaging and experiment result", Radar Conference 2014 IEEE, pp. 0512-0516, 2014.

ieee.title: Image Formation Algorithm for Asymmetric Bistatic SAR Systems With a Fixed Receiver
ieee.displayText: Tao Zeng, Feifeng Liu, Cheng Hu, Teng Long, "Image Formation Algorithm for Asymmetric Bistatic SAR Systems With a Fixed Receiver", Geoscience and Remote Sensing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 50, pp. 4684-4698, 2012, ISSN 0196-2892.

ieee.title: Space-Surface Bistatic SAR Image Formation Algorithms
ieee.displayText: Michail Antoniou, Mikhail Cherniakov, Cheng Hu, "Space-Surface Bistatic SAR Image Formation Algorithms", Geoscience and Remote Sensing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 47, pp. 1827-1843, 2009, ISSN 0196-2892.

ieee.title: On the spatial-temporal resolution of synthetic aperture radar: Uncertainty principle?
ieee.displayText: Zeng Tao, Chen Xinliang, Wang Jingyang, Zhang Kai, "On the spatial-temporal resolution of synthetic aperture radar: Uncertainty principle?", Radar Conference (Radar) 2014 International, pp. 1-6, 2014.

ieee.title: A GPS signal based numeric range migration algorithm of space-surface bistatic SAR
ieee.displayText: Jie Zhen, Zhenhua Zhang, Shunjun Wu, "A GPS signal based numeric range migration algorithm of space-surface bistatic SAR", Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium2009 IEEE InternationalIGARSS 2009, vol. 2, pp. II-49-II-52, 2009.

ieee.title: New directions in bistatic radar
ieee.displayText: H. D. Griffiths, "New directions in bistatic radar", Radar Conference 2008. RADAR '08. IEEE, pp. 1-6, 2008, ISSN 1097-5659.
